query:
SELECT p.id, p.userId, p.firstName, p.lastName, p.email, p.courseId, c.name as courseName, u.id as userIdFromUsers, u.email as userEmail
FROM participants p 
LEFT JOIN users u ON p.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN courses c ON p.courseId = c.id
WHERE p.email = 's.sachs+kompass@sachs-media.com' OR u.email = 's.sachs+kompass@sachs-media.com'
ORDER BY p.id DESC
LIMIT 5;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Ljv7tUcUqkJWz2.a9fc2ac34f70 --database Q4zKBZCPW5Fmg3HtsHcjY8 --execute SELECT p.id, p.userId, p.firstName, p.lastName, p.email, p.courseId, c.name as courseName, u.id as userIdFromUsers, u.email as userEmail
FROM participants p 
LEFT JOIN users u ON p.userId = u.id
LEFT JOIN courses c ON p.courseId = c.id
WHERE p.email = 's.sachs+kompass@sachs-media.com' OR u.email = 's.sachs+kompass@sachs-media.com'
ORDER BY p.id DESC
LIMIT 5;
